trans-unit.source: Constructs a web request to create a new block blob or page blob, or to update the content of an existing block blob.
trans-unit.target: Constructs a web request to create a new block blob or page blob, or to update the content of an existing block blob.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the absolute URI to the blob.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Uri</codeEntityReference> specifying the absolute URI to the blob.

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the server timeout interval.
trans-unit.target: An integer specifying the server timeout interval.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobProperties</codeEntityReference> object.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobProperties</codeEntityReference> object.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobType</codeEntityReference> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Blob.BlobType</codeEntityReference> enumeration value.

trans-unit.source: For a page blob, the size of the blob.
trans-unit.target: For a page blob, the size of the blob.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored for block blobs.
trans-unit.target: This parameter is ignored for block blobs.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.OperationContext</codeEntityReference> object that represents the context for the current operation.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest</codeEntityReference> object.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest</codeEntityReference> object.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored for block blobs.
trans-unit.target: This parameter is ignored for block blobs.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.AccessCondition</codeEntityReference> object that represents the condition that must be met in order for the request to proceed.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating whether to set the x-ms-version HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating whether to set the x-ms-version HTTP header.

trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.Net.HttpWebRequest</codeEntityReference> object.
